topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume III, Soviet Union, January 1981–January 1983
topic.body: This volume is the first of four Soviet bilateral volumes in the Reagan subseries. This volume commences with Ronald Reagan’s election on November 4, 1980, and concludes with his approval of National Security Decision Directive 75, “U.S. Relations With the USSR,” on January 17, 1983.
topic.image-description: Book cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1981–1988, Volume III, Soviet Union, January 1981–January 1983
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
